entries.journal_entry_description: Kymayrr has informed you that her son Rroot has gone missing while guiding some escaped wookiees through the Rryatt Trail, and has asked you to find him.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Kymayrr indicated that Rroot is being held at the camp where you previously captured the radio.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Rroot has informed you that one of the Feral Wookees has run off with the code to his restraint.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Now that you have the code, return and free Rroot from his bonds.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Some guards have returned from their patrol to find you trying to rescue their prisoner.
entries.task05_comm_message_text: Thank you friend, I can make my way from here. When you return to Mother let her know that all is well.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Having freed Rroot you should return to Kymayrr and share the news.
